The latest post for each category:

books

I am summarizing knowledge from books I've read recently, while offering my own conclusion. I hope that not only will this booklist provide quality suggestions for the LRC's book club. I also hope that my book/overall summaries and book/overall conclusions will bring the LRC closer to its goal of bringing newfound organizational research theory perspective for leaderlessness, ultimately aiding LRC in creating an informed proposal for an Internet-based group decision-making process, to be developed into a web app.

Lily's Initial Booklist @ (2018-04-28)
